marketplaces.repo_description: Marketplace for Personality Roulette Claude Code plugin

files.README.md:
# What Do You Do? Plugins

Claude Code plugins by [What Do You Do? LLC](https://whatdoyoudo.net).

## Install

```
/plugin marketplace add bhpascal/whatdoyoudo-plugins
/plugin install personality-roulette@whatdoyoudo-plugins
```

## Plugins

- **[Personality Roulette](https://github.com/bhpascal/personality-roulette)** -- Randomly assigns Claude one of seven distinct character personalities on session start.

plugins.name: personality-roulette
plugins.description: Randomly assigns Claude a distinct character personality on session start. Seven characters: Sea Captain, Starship Computer, Hyperintelligence, Archduke of Hell, Noir Detective, Nature Narrator, and Mission Control.
